CHAPTER 11 [Nick]49-nick leaned back in [his]49-nick leather chair , linked [his]49-nick hands behind [his]49-nick head , and stared out the floor - to - ceiling window of [[his]49-nick thirty - fourth floor office]998-his thirty - fourth floor office . The view over [the Sydney Harbor]35-the sydney harbor usually calmed [him]49-nick , allowing [him]49-nick to think clearly through meetings , negotiations and other sundry issues . But today the view did nothing to relax [him]49-nick . The sharp pain that had continued to stab at [his]49-nick heart since Friday night was still there , hacking away . Friday night . It was a night [he]49-nick 'd never forget , that was for sure . But for all the wrong reasons . The way [Abbey]42-abbey had looked in that blue dress , the way it hugged [her]42-abbey figure and rose and fell in time with [her]42-abbey heavy breathing . [She]42-abbey 'd wanted [him]49-nick , [he]49-nick could tell . Wanted [him]49-nick , yet all the time , hated [him]49-nick . [Nick]49-nick closed [his]49-nick eyes to block out the cheery blue sky and the memory of [Abbey]42-abbey on that night . [He]49-nick did n't want to be cheery today , and [he]49-nick did n't want to remember [Abbey]42-abbey . Ever . Problem was , it would take a hell of a long time to forget [her]42-abbey . How could [he]49-nick have made so many stupid mistakes in such a short amount of time ? It was n't like [him]49-nick . [He]49-nick 'd never failed so perfectly as [he]49-nick 'd failed last week . [His]49-nick mistakes were too numerous to count . [He]49-nick should have told [Abbey]42-abbey who [he]49-nick really was . It was n't like there were n't enough opportunities . [He]49-nick should n't have called [her]42-abbey [a hooker]119-a hooker for starters , especially to [her]42-abbey face , and [he]49-nick should n't have put [her]42-abbey through that ridiculous test . And finally [he]49-nick should have told [her]42-abbey [he]49-nick loved [her]42-abbey . That last realization had hit [him]49-nick so hard [he]49-nick could n’t stop shaking . On Friday night the minutes had ticked by so slowly as [he]49-nick waited for dawn and [the housekeeper]1742-the housekeeper , that it had given [him]49-nick a long time to think . [His]49-nick anger and vulnerability had subsided , surprisingly , replaced with a tumult of other emotions and fears . Most of them centered over [his]49-nick realization that [he]49-nick adored [Abbey]42-abbey , and that [he]49-nick was afraid of losing [her]42-abbey . As [he]49-nick lay on top of the bed , naked and bound , [he]49-nick understood what it meant to be stripped of [his]49-nick self - control . And it had nothing to do with the thought of being found like that in the morning . [Abbey]42-abbey . [The woman with the perfect body]1001-the woman with the perfect body , bright inquisitive eyes , mouth that begged to be kissed and the ability to make [him]49-nick laugh . [He]49-nick groaned . How could [he]49-nick have ever thought [she]42-abbey was [a hooker]119-a hooker ? [He]49-nick blew out a breath and turned back to the view . What view [Abbey]42-abbey was seeing today ? [She]42-abbey did n't know whether to laugh or cry . * * * A MONTH LATER [Nick]49-nick paced the length of [[his]49-nick office]1020-his office trying to work off [his]49-nick excess energy . [He]49-nick was up to [his]49-nick fifth cup of coffee and it was n't even lunchtime . [He]49-nick really did n't know why [he]49-nick was so nervous . It was only that fool [Tarken]46-tarken after all . It 's just that [he]46-tarken was [his]49-nick only link to [Abbey]42-abbey .
